title: Bluebonnets: A Monarch Beach Mystery
description: Teejay Bishop is back!Along with the friendly folks who call Monarch Beach home - including hunky detective John Kincaid and the newest resident, country singer T. Thomas Tanner, Tim to his friends.Monarch is picked as background for the singer's new videos, the whole gang is picked to appear in them and the Gem hosts a wedding celebration.Things are really looking up in the little coastal town. Until a woman disappears. Until someone starts taking shots. Until a headless carcass is left on the porch.Until one of them dies.
author: Mary Mead
